snippet: A team of three software developers made a single iPhone game that has become as addictive as all of Zynga's mobile games combined. Temple Run, a free game in the App Store, has become a smash hit with over 40 million downloads since its release in...
abstract: A team of three software developers made a single iPhone game that has become as addictive as all of Zynga's mobile games combined. Temple Run, a free game in the App Store, has become a smash hit with over 40 million downloads since its release in August.

headline.main: How Temple Run Became More Popular Than Zynga Games
